Detailed Description

DKCallback (interface)

Provides implementations of DKCallback for. 

 -[arg selector]
 -[target selector:arg]
 functionPointer(arg)
 NSInvocation objects

Returns a DKCallback that calls other with the result of self

+ (DKCallback *) fromInvocation: (NSInvocation *)  inv
parameterIndex: (NSUInteger)  i 

Returns a DKCallback from an NSInvocation parameter index must always be at least 2 to accomidate for _cmd and self.

Definition at line 169 of file DKCallback.m.

+ (DKCallback *) fromPointer: (dkCallback)  f  

Returns a DKCallback from a function pointer. It must have the signature id f(id arg) { }

Definition at line 165 of file DKCallback.m.

+ (DKCallback *) fromSelector: (SEL)  s  

Returns a DKCallback which will get it's result from performing selector on the argument it's called with.

Definition at line 157 of file DKCallback.m.

+ (DKCallback *) fromSelector: (SEL)  s
target: (NSObject *)  target 

Returns a DKCallback that will get it's result from performing selector on target. selector must always take exactly one id arg and return id.
